document.full_text: elizabeth taylor's renowned collection of jewelry, works of art, clothing and memorabilia will be sold at a series of auctions, christie's said on saturday.
document.title: elizabeth taylor's jewels, art, fashion to be auctioned
lines_and_colors: elizabeth taylor's renowned collection of jewelry, works of art, clothing and memorabilia will be sold at a series of auctions, christie's said on saturday.
